00019 #ifndef __CAMERA_H__

00027 CCL_NAMESPACE_BEGIN
00028 
00029 class Device;
00030 class DeviceScene;
00031 
00032 /* Camera
00033  *
00034  * The camera parameters are quite standard, tested to be both compatible with
00035  * Renderman, and Blender after remapping. */
00036 
00037 class Camera {
00038 public:
00039     /* motion blur */
00040     float shutteropen;
00041     float shutterclose;
00042 
00043     /* depth of field */
00044     float focaldistance;
00045     float aperturesize;
00046     uint blades;
00047     float bladesrotation;
00048 
00049     /* type */
00050     CameraType type;
00051     float fov;
00052 
00053     /* clipping */
00054     float nearclip;
00055     float farclip;
00056 
00057     /* screen */
00058     int width, height;
00059     float left, right, bottom, top;
00060 
00061     /* transformation */
00062     Transform matrix;
00063 
00064     /* computed camera parameters */
00065     Transform screentoworld;
00066     Transform rastertoworld;
00067     Transform ndctoworld;
00068     Transform rastertocamera;
00069     Transform cameratoworld;
00070     Transform worldtoraster;
00071 
00072     float3 dx;
00073     float3 dy;
00074 
00075     /* update */
00076     bool need_update;
00077     bool need_device_update;
00078 
00079     /* functions */
00080     Camera();
00081     ~Camera();
00082 
00083     void update();
00084 
00085     void device_update(Device *device, DeviceScene *dscene);
00086     void device_free(Device *device, DeviceScene *dscene);
00087 
00088     bool modified(const Camera& cam);
00089     void tag_update();
00090 };
00091 
00092 CCL_NAMESPACE_END
00093 
00094 #endif /* __CAMERA_H__ */
